page.title: 20Life in Morden cont.
page.content: It's nearly big enough for an aircraft to fit in.Not far from my house is a row of small shops.I don't mind going around to the shops as they are clean and the shop owners are really kind and friendly which also helps the shops to do a good trade.The shop I like going in best is the "do it yourself" shop.The old man in there is always cracking jokes that ancient but you still laugh because of the way he tells them .I end up staying around there for half an hour instead of ten minutes.But I'm still glad because soon they are going to be a thing of the past,replaced by big food chain stores. The only problem with them is the people at the checkout haven't got enough time to have a good chinwag. {Sarah Bowbrick
